Results: Alerts you to incoming armies! Reveals mission and objective of enemy Armies approaching your Turf or Camps.
Reveals the player name and coordinates of enemy Armies approaching your Turf or Camps.
Reveals remaining travel time of enemy Armies approaching your Turf or Camps.
Reveals the Guild of enemy Armies approaching your Turf or Camps.
Reveals the estimated size of enemy Armies approaching your Turf or Camps and the number of Heroes in them.
Indicates if an approaching enemy Army is led by the Leader and reveals its composition.
Reveals the estimated size of each squad and soldier class of enemy armies approaching your turf, camps or garrisoned troops.
Reveals the Hero lineup of enemy Armies approaching your Turf or Camps.
Reveals the actual size of each squad for enemy armies approaching your turf, camps or garrisoned troops.
Reveals the Rank and Grade of Heroes in enemy Armies Approaching your Turf or Camps.
Unlocks [Fortify] button! Quickly bolster your defenses for an impeding Siege Battle and lower your enemies' power!
